name: SUPERCOLONY!
description:
SUPER COLONY!

It is time we come together and form the supercolony! As ants, we know the definition of hard work. Imagine if that hard work was directed into bringing this colony closer together. We recognise each colonies claim to fame. But now is the time to put community first and form the supercolony!

Unite the UCA (United Colonies of Antmerica)

Credits: 

Rednbloo: Game designer/artist 

Creepy Chainsaw: Writer

 Fredzan: Music/sound effects

 Ori: Code
